name: @atlantis-l/radix-desktop-tool
author: atlantis-l
description: A desktop tool to interact with the radix network

scripts.build-dist: prettier . --write && vue-tsc --noEmit && export VITE_CJS_IGNORE_WARNING=true && vite build
scripts.build-mac: prettier . --write && vue-tsc --noEmit && export VITE_CJS_IGNORE_WARNING=true && export CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false && vite build && electron-builder --mac --x64
scripts.build-win: prettier . --write && vue-tsc --noEmit && export VITE_CJS_IGNORE_WARNING=true && export CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false && vite build && electron-builder --win --x64
